title: Pocatello Art Center to offer new class in May
title_page: Pocatello Art Center to offer new class in May
maintext:
POCATELLO - A new class will be taught in May at the Pocatello Art Center on “Creating Abstract Art”.
The class will be taught by abstract artist Daav Corbet.The class will be held May 8, 15, 22, and 29 from 7 to 9 p.m. each night.
Expand your artistic language by exploring the principles in abstract art. Classes will cover, line color, shape and motions as modes to expressing the abstract. This class will expand your thinking for traditional painting styles. Each will will feature a different project with specific goals in either theory or method. The class is $55 for members and $65 for non-members for all four sessions. Please register by calling the Pocatello Art Center at 208 232-0970.
